arts.ttl: FC Barcelona possible starting XI vs Getafe in LaLiga EA Sports
arts.sum: In goal, Joan García is expected to remain, enjoying a spectacular start to the season in every sense. If these three absences from the starting lineup are confirmed, the German coach would likely field a new center-back pairing: Eric García and Andreas Christensen, flanked on the wings by Jules Koundé and Gerard Martí.
